components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,POWER TRAIN,ELECTRICAL SYSTEM
summary: WHILE DRIVING AT ANY SPEED, VEHICLE'S SPEED WILL START DECEASING, UNTIL VEHICLE  LOSSES ALL POWER. THE DEALERSHIP HAS MADE SEVERAL ATTEMPTS TO  FIX PROBLEM, BUT  IT STILL EXIST.  TS  RADIATOR OVERFLOWED.  ELECTRICAL PROBLEMS.  DEALER COULD NOT FIND A REMEDY.  VEHICLE WAS ALSO JUMPING OUT OF 2ND AND 3RD GEAR.  MAJOR SERVICE REVEALED ENGINE WAS THROWING OIL.  2 BOLTS WERE TIGHTENED.  *TT
